name: Sakura Wars 4: Fall in Love, Maidens
overview: Four months after the events in Paris, Lieutenant Ichiro Ogami reunites with Flower Division of the Imperial Combat Revue. During that time a spirit breaks from imprisonment and begins terrorizing the city. The Flower division is forced to used their Kobus however, they forced to retreat to the Grand Imperial Theater, and Ogami is forced to call upon the help of the Paris Combat Revue.
